abilities.name: Raging Roar
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may attach 1 Darkness Energy from your discard pile to this Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Dark Mountain
attacks.effect: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. This attack does 50 more damage for each Supporter card discarded in this way.
